subject: Re: [junit] which jdk will work with JUnit on Redhat6.2?
msgSnippet: Oops, here is the output again: FAILURES!!! Test Results: Run: 78 Failures: 2 Errors: 1 There was 1 error: 1)
messageBody:

----- Original Message -----
From: Peter Bismuti
To: junit@egroups.com
Sent: Friday, January 19, 2001 1:07 PM
Subject: [junit] which jdk will work with JUnit on Redhat6.2?

   
I've been told my JDK is broken (see output below).  I've had problems in the past, for example on 2 different JDKs jar files could not be added to my classpath.  I use Redhat6.2, is there anyone who knows of a JDK that will work with with JUnit? 
 
Thanks
